price: Na kae Yε nkoa Abraham ne Is’haaq ne Ya’aquub. Nokorε sε na wͻyε nnipa a wͻn wͻ ahoͻden (wͻ Nyamesom mu) na wͻn wͻ anisoade-hunu nso.
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرۡ عِبَٰدَنَآ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ وَإِسۡحَٰقَ وَيَعۡقُوبَ أُوْلِي ٱلۡأَيۡدِي وَٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kur ʿibādanā ib'rāhīma wa-is'ḥāqa wayaʿqūba ulī al-aydī wal-abṣāri
